definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word

sentences.english: Vintage middleweight bicycles had racks that could carry books or groceries.
sentences.chinese: 中量級有架老式自行車可能攜帶書籍或雜貨。

sentences.english: Cotto also has to train very hard to make the welterweight limit.
sentences.chinese: 庫託也得艱苦訓練以使體重回到次中量級標準。

sentences.english: Berto is the WBC welterweight titleholder.
I thought he improved at junior middleweight.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲升到超次中量級的他有些進步。

sentences.english: They did not even remember that he was middleweight boxing champion.
sentences.chinese: 他們甚至記不得他曾是中量級拳擊冠軍。

sentences.english: He held both the lightweight and middleweight college boxing championships.
sentences.chinese: 他保持大學輕量級和中量級雙冠軍。

sentences.english: Middleweight bicycle tanks are smaller than balloon tire bikes.
sentences.chinese: 中量級自行車坦克小於氣球自行車輪胎。
